Author: TOM47
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Debitum Network Looks To Push Baltic Fintech, Mobile Payments Advances https://paymentweek.com/2018-10-29-debitum-network-looks-push-baltic-fintech-mobile-payments-advances/  It may surprise you to know that the three little countries that form the Baltic States‚ÄìEstonia, Latvia and Lithuania‚Äìhave become major figures in financial technology (fintech) over the years. Anyway, these little countries are bringing out some heavy hitters, and one of the latest and greatest is the Debitum Network.  A recent study by the World Economic Forum rated this trio as three of the seven leading innovators in the field, joining such major nations as Sweden and the United Kingdom itself. Though there are merely around six million people in the region, it‚Äôs already become known for fintech luminaries like Bondora, Mintos, and TransferGo.  Now, with blockchain an increasingly large part of the proceedings in fintech, the three are turning their attention to development therein. With the current operations used in the Debitum Network, it actually becomes possible to assess a loan application immediately. That means, for those qualified, funds can be disbursed much more rapidly and those who qualify can put them to work promptly.  Martin Liberts, co-founder of the Debitum Network, noted ‚ÄúThe finance world has acknowledged that blockchain technology is here to stay, and this is evident with major European banks such as BBVA, Credit Suisse, and SEB using it. As way of improving transparency amongst alternative finance providers, transparency-boosting KYC/AML procedures have been put in-place to maintain the popularity of alternative finance amongst SMEs. With banks gradually turning to decentralized technologies, it is important for alternative finance providers to adopt blockchain in order remain relevant to SME owners.‚Äù  It just goes to prove, in the end, that a good idea really can come from anywhere. While most likely didn‚Äôt expect the Baltics to produce top-notch fintech, they did, and on several occasions. So many occasions, in fact, that they‚Äôre now one of the leading sources of innovation in Europe. The Debitum Network is just the latest such effort, and it‚Äôs going to deliver plenty of impact on its own.  As the Debitum Network improves loan processing and contributes to the growth of fintech and mobile payments, it‚Äôs a safe bet that the Baltics are already working to produce more advances. It will be interesting to see what they come up with to top Debitum.

Author: kusumadewi
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Announce about MakerDAO and Debitum Network ongoing cooperation to integrate their systems and utilize the power of Dai Stablecoin to maximize profits for investors on Debitum lending platform and hedge against volatility that most cryptocurrencies undergo on a regular basis. Currently, Debitum Network is testing API integration capabilities between the respective systems.  As a result of the integration, investors will be able to enjoy the benefits:  1. Earn interest on asset-based loans and support financing needs of SMEs around the world.  2. To profit from increased crypto price during the loan period.  3. Minimize the risk of decreasing crypto value as SME loans are asset-based and will likely have smaller downward volatility than that of crypto.  https://blog.debitum.network/cooperation-debitum-network-makerdao/

For example, let's say you had 50,000 euro worth of DEB on the platform, as an SME if you wanted to finance a 5000 euro invoice, you could put it on the platform and finance it yourself and just pay fees. Of course you would not do this normally but if you wanted to always be liquid it's an option. Or even finance another invoice at higher interest rate and capture the spread. Hope that makes sense.

Author: camargoherrera
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: I don't think it has anything to do with technical issues. There is only that much fees you can charge on a loan. If fiat investors are to earn about 10% annual interest on the money they bring in then the total amount of other fees ( paid in DEB) has an upper limit. If total fees on platform also amount to 10% of loan value then the loans would come at a 20% interest rate for borrowers.

Author: sukhwindersingh
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: The low price of the coin does not reflect hard work of team, but rather the weak use case for the coin. Even if expected $10 million worth of loans that is already committed to come on the platform does effectively show up in September, how much DEB fees can you charge on that? Maybe something like $100,000 worth of DEB with $90,000 coming straight back on the market after service providers have received payment. Net utility demand for $10,000 worth of DEB will hardly move the coin. The picture may change as we learn more details about the practical coin usage, but most investors base their buying/selling on the known information...

Author: elllze
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: At the moment, it is going to be held in Debitum's account that is going to be strictly for the user deposit use. We are, however, applying to get an EMI licence which would give out segregated accounts and IBAN account numbers to our users. As soon as we're licensed, the functionality will be developed. Another option we are looking into is rolling out partnerships that would provide us with the functionality. We do understand the high importance of the feature, thus we're looking to carry it out soon.  Quote from: zayzik on July 26, 2018, 05:07:05 AM Why do ppl think the price will go up? I mean the project will go ahead and flourish but why would more people invest into the token? Whats the need for the token?  The token will have various use in Debitum Ecosystem, thus it will be essential for those, who are looking to use the platform.    Thanks everyone for your support!

Author: kusumadewi
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: UPDATE FROM DEVELOPERS  We'll start a weekly updates of what's new at Debitum Network to ensure that our dear community - you - know what's happening and what to expect in the near future!  Firstly, thank you all for active participation. We saw several good discussions and a few not so good, yes - I‚Äôm talking about the few flamers out - we are watching you   Honestly, we do understand your frustrations since the price of DEB token is yet to start climbing and the updates from us have been few. So here is what you might have missed last week.            BlockShow Europe, Berlin.  Martins, Gabriele, Mantas (our new CMO) has participated in the conference and brought several good ideas home. There is a company that is tokenizing gold, essentially enabling physical gold to be used on the blockchain. We are brainstorming around this to see if we could use actual physical gold for investments on Debitum Network. Another ICO project with which we started partnership negotiations, if successful, should enable a feature on Debitum Network to invest not only in fiat but crypto, while the borrower still receives fiat. We will keep you posted. We got to meet Sonja and Milos from CoinTelegraph Serbia team; these guys are much fun :beers: After the conference, we already hosted Christian from FinTechNews in Vilnius, Lithuania on the next day. So our industry connections are growing!  We also received KTU trust score, well half of it. It‚Äôs the part that analyses and provides the initial score for new registrations on Debitum Network. It looks good, we thought of a few minor tweaks and questions and submitted for revision.   Our CFO, Petras,  has done a great job securing us a business runway in a manageable way for the next 3-4 years. We asked him to share his strategies with everyone. This also gave us ideas how to partner up with StartUps and ICOs and how to make the platform highly useful for their financial asset management activities. We hope to get these features available in Abra 1.0 when we launch in September.  On the development side, we deployed a security infrastructure layer last week (automatic cluster deployments on AWS infrastructure with monitoring tools), and this week developers will stress test it. Moreover, the platform itself has received a facelift with several new design screens and functionality for industries. We'll show later this week.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: to my understanding when I first researched Debitum was that their plan is to focus on releasing the platform by Q3 this year.  They plan on achieving demand for the token by customers needing to use the Debitum token in their Eco System.  The token will pay for things like, loan insurance, credit reports and other uses.  They already have clients set up that will need loans and investors that will invest to fulfill these loans and these people will need the Debitum token to conduct business.  This will increase demand and put an upwards buying pressure on the token and cause the price to increase.  The platform needs to be released for this to happen though... which is very soon... our patience will pay off.. I hope that helps..

Author: Sucess
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Loan business being done on the platform will create demand for DEB. But it's good to remember that it will also create new supply soon after. For example a loan insurer that gets paid in DEB may instantly cash out most (if not all) those DEB for fiat, because most of their costs of doing business are paid in fiat (e.g. wages). It will likely take a rather large amount of loan business until it creates a meaningful upward pressure on the token price. But that will depend on how much DEB is on average used to process $1 million in loans on the platform. We don't know that number yet.

The idea is to keep the tokens below ico price, so that the crowd will hold the tokens for longer till they release their shit-net release.

Author: termion
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: product is intends to decentralize the financing process. Currently, all steps of the financing process are carried out by one financial institution in a centralized manner from the very beginning to the very end. As a result, such financier can only operate in the local market due to the lack of infrastructure abroad (otherwise it becomes very expensive). Moreover, the capacity of financing is also limited, resulting in only a fraction of SMEs‚Äô needs being fulfilled. Debitum Network will be an ecosystem where participants from all around the world will perform separate steps of the financing process. For example, a German SME needs funding, so it joins to Debitum Network; a risk assessor from Germany rates the risk; credit insurance company from France performs the insurance; a fund from the UK provides the money; a local debt collector from Germany either collects or buys the debt.

Author: Manswers
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: I have asked this question a several times, and got banned from their telegram group, and after posting this on reddit, the thread was deleted and my rights were revoked to post anything on debitum's page. The team is Nazi as fuck!!  Now here is what i wanted to know.. Debitum ICO sale ran for a couple of days, and after suppoman shilled for the tokens they reached about 65% of their hardcap, and the team was struggling to sell the last 30% of their tokens. What did you do with those tokens? Did u burn them? U never mentioned anything about. You for sure did not reach your had cap all of a sudden one night earlier before stopping the sale. The only reason I can see why hundreds and thousands of tokens were sold for less than half of the ICO price is cos the left over tokens were sold for half the price by the team members. Yes this is a very shady practice, and thats the reason they are surpressing everyone's voice.  I can see why Ian Shillina says, before you invest in an ICO make sure you get the facts right from the company, cos once they have your money they wont care about investors and the promises. I sincerely think Deb team has diverted the funds from the ICO into their cash strapped parent company Debifo. No wonder people trust Asian ICO's more than these Latvian and Russian ICO's.  These guys have fake accounts on telegram and you wont seem them talking or chatting about anything, but as soon as someone questions the team and the tokens economics, they jump out of their hibernation, switch the admin account to a random troll account and then start insulting the members to shut them up. How comfy... right!?? Saying that its a new ico, and not to expect 10x returns right on day one is naive, or pure stupidity. If Debitum is such a good products as the fanboy's (fake accounts) tout it to be and worship it day and night.. then they should have been atleast at the ICO price.. not lower than half price when they hit the exchanges. Right now they are resting inbetween 2 or 3 shatoshi's. Only worthless shitcoins value this amount. Not an upcoming world wrecking technology like debitum.

Author: kusumadewi
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: For security purpose, system infrastructure will have public, easy available for everyone, and private, controlled by system administrators, subnets. Adapters will communicate with the ecosystem through load balancers in public subnet which main goal is to send data for ecosystem parts in private subnet. In private subnet, EVM for communication with blockchains, would be deployed. Also, kubernetes cluster where application, which will communicate with blockchain, and provide data of smart contract status changes. All (which are not powered in Ethereum blockchains) infrastructure will run in Amazon Web Service infrastructure

Author: Debitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Totally inappropriate comment. Firstly, we will not lend in crypto, lending will be held in FIAT. We have hybrid model and we do understand that lending in crypto is not possible while it is so volatile.  We are not located in Russia or have any connections with it. To repay debts we will use local debt collectors and loans will be secured with collaterals.  There are many great and successful ICO projects from Lithuania. Your sources are wrong.

Author: nickbelski
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Welcome to the future!  PayPie credit risk assessment to be adopted by DEBITUM network  VANCOUVER, Canada, February 9, 2018 ‚Äì PayPie and Debitum Network announced today that the business credit risk assessment powered by blockchain technology provided by PayPie will be adopted by Debitum Network as its dedicated blockchain-based risk score provider for business loans exclusively for businesses in North America.  " Debitum Network users can directly access the PayPie scores from within the platform for greater convenience. "  " PayPie and Debitum will agree on initially exchanging PPP tokens for Debitum DEB tokens to seed user adoption. "  I already foresee this two companies will be market leaders in decentralized loans area, no doubt about it.

Moreover, we want to be fair to Round A participants that they would receive bonus they have paid for. So, we will distribute additional 4950 DEB for every 1 ETH contributed. You can read it on our blog: https://blog.debitum.network/important-changes-deb-eth-token-structure/  Additional tokens will be distributed within 15 days after the crowdsale. Tokens you are purchasing during the crowdsale are distributed via smart contract immediately once the transaction is made. However, they stay vested till Round B ends.

The problem of financing small and medium-sized enterprises, insider‚Äôs view ‚Äì Debitum Network founder‚Äôs account  'Banks refused to help me throwing absurd reasons; the family wasn‚Äôt able to help because the sums required were too big. I was forced to sell a large part of the company‚Äôs shares to the investor just to survive. After the shares sale, and obtaining the vital cash injection, the company finished the year with a very solid profit. A few more weeks without money would have caused the company‚Äôs bankruptcy.'  https://blog.debitum.network/problem-financing-small-medium-sized-enterprises-insiders-view-debitum-network-founders-account/?utm_content=buffer876dd&utm_medium=social&utm_source=facebook.com&utm_campaign=buffer

Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Yes, everything will be transparent on the blockchain with credit histories and the overall rating.  Moreoever, if service requestor (borrower or investor) won‚Äôt get any follow up actions from particular community, it will be possible to register feedback with Debitum Network Trust Arbitrage. It will investigate if community actions were sufficient. If not, Debitum Network Trust Arbitrage may take a pre-designed action, i.e., use counterparty‚Äôs frozen Debitum tokens to compensate feedback provider, manually drop rating for the counterparty or its community, or even ban the counterparty or its entire community from Debitum Network.

Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Debitum Network Leverages Ethereum Blockchain to Deliver Game-changing Small Business Finance Solution  Debitum Network, a business financing blockchain startup, is quickly emerging as a robust small business finance solution that promises to eliminate the need for the highly over-regulated intermediaries. This project has just completed a successful crowdsale campaign, and has recently clinched the first place in both jury and audience in the prestigious d10e ICO Pitch Award.  Debitum Network continues its dream run towards achieving its mission towards building a decentralized, safe, and transparent ecosystem for micro, small, and medium business financing. An innovative funding platform based on the Ethereum blockchain, Debitum Network strives to free the SMEs around the world from the middlemen and provide them financing opportunities that have always been out of bounds to them.  Read more on Coinidol: https://coinidol.com/debitum-network-leverages-ethereum-blockchain/

Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: We want to thank each and every one of our contributors  and share some hottest news from our office. That's what happened on the first 24 hours of our Crowdsale:  - 10% of Hardcap reached in the first 3 hours of Crowdsale and growing. - None of our contributors experienced lost or fraudulent transactions. - 500+ messages send to our contributors on our Telegram channel. - 20% of all transactions were suspended due to increased transactions on Ethereum. Avoid launching an ICO when everyone is busy playing Cryptokitties  With the current results in mind, we are expecting to reach our Round One Hardcap 3 days earlier then we had predicted and you still can be a part of it @ https://registration.debitum.network/

Body: Ethereum blockchain has been overloaded in the past days because of kittens game. We had many pending transactions and the GAS price increased to 60Gwei. However, there are good news. GAS price has dropped dramatically, transactions in Ethereum is 6x cheaper. We recommend to set GAS price to ~10Gwei. https://ethgasstation.info/

Author: Debitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Now it is easier  to participate in Debitum Network Crowdsale!  Good news for everyone who wants to participate in Debitum Network Crowdsale! During the start of our crowdsale, some contributors couldn't receive our smart contract address. We solved this issue and now, for those who wish to contribute up to 30eth, the process is much easier.  How to make a contribution: ‚Ä¢   Go to https://registration.debitum.network ‚Ä¢   If you choose to contribute up to 30eth, you will see smart contract address. IMPORTANT SECURITY TIP: Please check that the address you see in the website matches the address in the video with our co-founder Martins Liberts. ‚Ä¢   Now you can make your contribution - no registration required if your contribution is up to 30eth! ‚Ä¢   If you want to contribute 30-60eth, the KYC procedure is necessary. However, our team is working really fast, so it won't take too long.  Join Debitum Network Crowdsale NOW and get your 30% bonus much faster! Let the Debitum Network blockchain journey begin!

Author: silvestar
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: I did not fully understand the logic of the project. Is it a debiting platform like Lendoite? At the beginning, they were told something safe to keep their funds. If so, it's a little hard to hold. But what happens in this market is not clear. Maybe you will look it later and it will do good works.

Author: Debitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Lendoit is a consumer lending platform which works fully in crypto. On the other hand, Debitum Network is a hybrid solution for small and medium business financing. We will not offer our services for private consumers. Moreover, we chose to offer financing for SMEs in FIAT, cause FIAT is what businesses need at the moment till crypto is massively adopted. That is a smart and working business solution in the real world where businesses still work in environment where dollars and euros are needed in everyday operations.  However, Debitum token will be used in the ecosystem to pay for various services like risk assessment, document validation, debt collection etc., as well as to guarantee the delivery of the services.

Author: Debitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: We are targeting micro, small and medium enterprises which is 90% of all businesses globally. We have a business plan of entering 50 target countries. Our crowdsale stage 1 hardcap is customized to enter 15 markets in Europe (Euro zone, CEE and Balkan countries).

Author: Immer
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem

Author: slavonicpl
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Yes, the second stage will start on January 25 and will last for a month.

Author: Debitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: We have a detailed business development plan (see Whitepaper) on how and what countries we are planning to launch. We are discussing with specific companies that deal on a local and regional basis, like CreditInfo that we already announced about. We put a lot of energy to make the ecosystem in a way that allows to use it for non-crypto users. There will be an option via fiat facilitator to send fiat and get DEB for using system. Hence Debitum Network will not be influenced by regulators, as it's not possible to ban using blockchain (with crypto) in general, just some specific action with it. We have planned for working closely with regulators (we are participating in workgroup with European Parliament) to make sure we do everything possible to ensure that DEB is usable.

Author: coin63
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: The project sets ambitious goals to seize the market, but what about the fact that the crypto currency is not recognized by developed countries, without whose participation, the project will not be able to reach the target scale?

Author: nextwalker
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Exactly true. Crypto currency is not accepted as a traditional currency in most countries (with the exception of Japan) and since most of the Crypto currency is too volatile, most business borrowers and investors in the short to medium term would prefer to deal with repayment of principal and interest in the usual way - using fiat money

Author: coin63
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: So, there is not planned to immediately "cross out" the usual money? Personally, I think it's very reasonable!

Author: nextwalker
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: The Debitum network plans to use the crypto currency only for fees associated with the financing cycle, and to freeze tokens with a guarantee. The ecosystem here is an intermediary in fiat money.

Author: coin63
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: What is the role of the ecosystem in this case? What mediation tasks does it solve?

Author: nextwalker
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Obviously, its purpose is to ensure the conduct of transactions with fiat money, creating the necessary registries in the blockchain.

Author: coin63
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: I agree with the previous post. Do not forget that over time, the crypto currency will become more popular, it will be possible to move the capital associated with loans to a blockchain.

Author: Debitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Debitum Network offers a hybrid solution - companies‚Äô financing will be executed in fiat. We are crypto realists instead of crypto fanatics that is why we are not using crypto while it is still not adopted mainstream. We want to create a truly decentralized network via motivated communities - so it can be a living ecosystem, rather than a bunch of individual organizations trying to deal services. It is a pragmatic approach which works in the real life.

Author: Debitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: We will have a special member in the ecosystem - debt collector who is meant exactly for this. As debt cannot be automatically recovered on blockchain, this debt collector actor will do all non-blockchain activities needed, and will ensure max collection of outstanding debt. Another option against bad debts will be possibility to insure the investment / loan taken. In that case all or part of investment (based on insurance terms) will be repaid in case of bad debt.

Author: Debitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem

Author: Debitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Debitum Network is creating a fairer, more accessible way for Small Medium Enterprises to access critical growth funding.   Global Credit Gap   Small businesses around the world are forced to work in difficult environments, and severely lack access to credit. The current credit gap is estimated to be an astonishing $2 trillion. According to World Bank's data, approximately 70% of all Micro and Small to Medium sized businesses in emerging markets lack access to credit.   Essentially, the current system's broken. It‚Äôs controlled by the Central Banks, highly constrained and strictly over-regulated. Through regulation, local financial institutions are actually instructed to block SME‚Äôs from receiving funds from International or individual investors, making it tough to realize their true business potential.   The cost of trust provision between lenders and borrowers is also too high. Businesses struggle for reasonably accessible financing due to the lack of effective international marketplaces, and transparent pledge security registries.   Debitum Network is designed to unite borrowers and those who help them apply: investors (lenders), risk assessors, document validators, insurers, etc. Companies or individual professionals who work in the alternative finance space can connect-in to the network for free and immediately begin facilitating cross-border deals.  Debitum Network is built as a hybrid platform   All actions are processed through the Ethereum Blockchain, making Debitum Network a secure and incorruptible infrastructure. It‚Äôs made up of an Ethereum-based family of smart contracts, facilitated by one internal means of payment. Transactions run through Fiat currencies, ensuring businesses can actually use the service easily in their locality, and from day one.  Utility of Debitum Token  Utility of Debitum tokens will be multifold. We have analyzed various possible token models, applied the findings to Debitum Network use cases and accordingly designed Debitum token to run two key roles within the ecosystem:  Value exchange role to build and nurture Debitum Network economy: Debitum tokens will be spent by borrowers and investors to buy services on the ecosystem with an ability to set the price for the services acquired in accordance with the quantity and quality of services received. Debitum token will allow all ecosystem users to earn value and to spend it on valuable services in a measured way.  Toll role Debitum tokens will be used as a security to guarantee a counterparty‚Äôs delivery of service.  Moreover, tokens will also be used to run Trust Arbitrage smart contracts that will indicate trust levels of counterparties within the ecosystem. This way tokens will ensure credibility of Debitum Network.  Partners and supporters of Debitum Network: Ministry of Economy of the Republic of Lithuania, Creditinfo, Finpass, Inntec, Debifo, eskolos, Lenderwize.  Awards: winner of d10e ICO pitch competition in Gibraltar both in Investors and Audience awards.

Author: finvestor
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Hi, how does the product actually work in case of full blockchain/crypto solution? Thanks.

Author: Debitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: An operator company provides a human engagement interface for every actor of Debitum Network (a website or an app plus the relations procedure), Debitum provides most of the back-end. Principal capital moves by the ordinary means as it is considered to be ‚Äòphysical goods‚Äô. In case of full-crypto scenario, crypto is transferrred to the borrower and later it is returned to investors to cover interest and other fees (such as insurance or debt collection). Most important actions of service providers and other actors are written on blockchain by using Debitum tokens, in this way transparency and trust is ensured. Debitum Network operators will ensure smooth fiat-crypto interaction at the beginning of Debitum Network development until crypto payments become mainstream. At very beginning factoring services will be offered for small businesses as Debitum Network team has extensive experience in this space. Many more credit products will be offered straight off - credits, credit lines, VAT refunds, leasing etc.

Author: finvestor
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Do you have a timeline for when it could go to all-crypto?

Author: Debitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: It depends on crypto adoption in the general public. If crypto will be accepted by wider public, regular payments will be made in crypto, businesses will also adapt it. Now we want to be crypto realists and currently businesses cannot easily use crypto in their daily activities, mostly due to volatility and no regulations. Much is still unknown and hard to predict, but we are positive and we believe that sooner or later it will be all-crypto platform.

Author: Debitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem

We are still improving its design and illustrations; however, it is already available on our website - https://debitum.network/whitepaper  Please go and check it out! We notice that the ones who do - really like out project!

Author: finvestor
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: What's the difference between minimum and soft cap? Why is your hard cap amount is 4 times the soft cap?

Author: Debitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: If we don't reach minimum - we take that community does not trust us to do this project at all, so smart contract we return all contributions. If we raise more than minimum - we believe that we have some trust, so we can move on with the project, try to raise funds in different way, move slowly etc. Soft cap, however, is the amount we think is needed to actually start the reasonable implementation of the project based on the calculations. The difference between the soft cap and hard cap is high, because implementing our project in 50 countries we have selected requirbusies big budget for business development. If we raise the hard cap we would be able to expand to those markets, if we raise less we would have to adjust our expansion scope to the budget we have.

Author: Debitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: It is described in TGE document (https://www.debitum.network/whitepaper) and we provided another answer just a couple of messages ago - the unsold tokens will be moved to Reserve.  Our Debitum Token is a utility token, hence it can't be burned. If tokens would be burned, they should be considered securities. We do not want our utility token to be considered a security!  We have designed the token to be used for utility value (pay for services, use to deploy trust smart contract) and toll value (freeze tokens as a guarantee for service fulfillment in the future).

Author: finvestor
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Why do you have fiat money in the business cycle? Isn't it possible to do it all crypto?

Author: gnomas
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Let's say I have a company which builds houses and we won the contract to build a skyscraper in Dubai. I will receive significant part of the money then i will finish my work. But I need to pay salary for my employees and I don't think that guys, who worked in building industry for years, will suddenly accept salary in crypto, nor can I pay for equipment rent with crypto. That's why I think fiat in Debitum model is great.

Author: Debitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: You have made an excellent point - that is exactly why we need fiat in the beginning. In the long run crypto may be used. But before that we should work together to make crypto more accepted around the world and also wait for crypto to become less volatile.

Author: yardyhardymoney877
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Which technology will the token be built on and why this? Will you have a smart contract?

Author: Debitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Our DEB token will be built on Ethereum based (ERC223) technology. From the start of the crowdsale everything will be guided with the transparent smart contract.

Author: Debitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: As experience shows most investors stay for a long time in the ecosystem, no need to get fiat back after each investment. So you can keep investing and continuing earning interest.  To provide tokens for buying services, some interest will be converted to Debitum tokens and available for investors to purchase services of the ecosystem.

Author: finvestor
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: I am doing more due diligence on Debitum Network project, it looks sane, well-thought and useful to community itself. I will be able to share more news once I complete my analysis, but already now I see some strong points for this project to be successful:  1. Market - is huge, underserved by banks, many different players, lack of network 2. Team - both financial and IT background, previous on-hand business experience 3. Advisors - looks like business people, not only shiny names on the webpage  What do you guys think? Am I missing something?

Author: Debitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: IT'S OFFICIAL!  Debitum Network won BOTH jury and public awards at d10e pitch competition in Gibraltar! What a great achievement and appraisal for our project! We managed to beat all the other competing 17 ICO projects.  http://oi63.tinypic.com/5p07qu.jpg  Now we are even more motivated to work hard for success of our project.  Photos from the award ceremony will be uploaded soon.

Author: Lipe490
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: You're willing to make a platform backed only for p2p or you intend to expand it to b2b? I really enjoy projects like those platforms and I wonder if you can launch a beta product for early investors to test it? I saw you guys have an excellent experience with the financial market but would be great to see more people from the team with blockchain and crypto experienced to bring a good value for the whole project. Besides that I see you have a future and can be one of few enterprises that could deliver a good product for crypto community.

Author: Debitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: In fact Debitum Network is B2B ecosystem for serving small business worldwide and to link them with investors and other financing process actors. The financing process depends on blockchain ensured trust rating to allow for picking business partners more efficiently and transparently.  You can take a look at our MVP - https://demo.debitum.network We have developed it as a proof of concept of Debitum Network secondary market. It runs on Ethereum Ropsten, hence you need Ropsten Ether to run smart contracts and send funds within MVP. To see the technical implementation of MVP, check our GitHub channel - https://github.com/debitum

Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem

Author: ivanpoldark
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem

Author: Debitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Thanks for your questions. It will have Utility value (to pay for services) & Toll value (service providers will freeze some to guarantee quality).

Author: Debitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: In case you have any questions, just drop a line in here and we are ready to answer them. Use cases of Debitum Network ecosystem for small business: invoice financing for releasing frozen capital in long payment terms, short-term loans for working capital, long-term loans for capital investments, VAT refund for increasing working capital, contract financing for delivering good to the agreed customer, to name just a few.  You are welcome to join our Telegram channel for open discussion: https://t.me/joinchat/G6KFmURKsu0FIfJetJ3mOA

Author: Debitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Thanks for the offer. We are considering bounty campaign for Debitum Network project. We hope to have more news this week. We will post it here, but you are also welcome to join our Telegram channel (https://t.me/joinchat/G6KFmURKsu0FIfJetJ3mOA) for updates.

Author: Debitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem

Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Okay, so I can buy invoices/loans with Debitum Network coin and get return in the same token?

Author: bantalguling
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: now very many projects are awake and it turns out after until the market price of the token never touched the ico price of the project itself maybe I feel this project will not be like that by holding airdrop or gift for the development of this project

Author: VanSuKi
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: This project looks good. I'll put into my watch list.

Author: BountifulMan
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: What do you need your token for if your business transactions will be made in fiat currencies?

Author: Debitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Investments in loans are made in fiat and interest is paid in fiat also. Debitum token will be used for investor to pay for additional services like debt collection, risk assessment etc. Hence we provide option to convert part of interest to be received automatically from fiat to tokens. Otherwise investors would receive fiat repayment + interest.

Author: Debitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Good question. Debitum token will be used for investor to pay for additional services in the Debitum ecosystem like debt collection, risk assessment etc. Also tokens will have a toll value, services providers will freeze them to guarantee quality of their services.  Please read our TGE document: https://debitum.network/assets/files/Debitum-TGE-Document-v2.0.pdf

Author: Debitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: You are welcome and thanks for the comment. We recommend to join our Telegram channel (https://t.me/joinchat/G6KFmURKsu0FIfJetJ3mOA) for open discussions and quick updates.

Author: finvestor
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Ok, so we would have to convert our BTC/ETH to FIAT, buy a loan piece, and when we get paid back in FIAT, that can be used to buy another loan or invoice? Or the repayment would be done in Debitum Network coin and we would have to repeat the procedure?

Author: Debitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Thanks for thumbs up. Local banks might be reluctant to join the decentralized financing platform at first as banks have locked (and centralized) the financing process. It might take time for them to adapt and join the new financing ecosystem, but we are sure they will be willing to use at least some of their expertise. We believe that over the time they will realise that decentralised model is more efficient and even cheaper.  Banks and their investment bank units are always seeking attractive risk-return investments and they are likely to join the platform as liquidity providers.

Author: finvestor
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Okay, sounds fair.  Is it going to be only invoice financing or do you plan to include other loan products? Could you expand on this?

Author: Debitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: We have extensive experience in invoice financing. We have a running factoring business ourselves, so this would one of the main services at the beginning of Debitum Network. But to solve global problem of SME financing, we have to offer more financial services - loans, credit lines, VAT return factoring and more in the future.

Author: finvestor
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: That helps. Do you have an idea what rate of return investors could expect in invoices or loans? Am I will be able to participate in funding these loans or it will be exclusive for institutional investors? Thanks.

Author: finvestor
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: I guess the risk factor is important here. Who will evaluate the risk for specific loans? Can investors do it themselves or take at least few risk reports to be sure it is a safe investment? Thanks.

Author: Debitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Rate of return for loan investments will depends on many factors, such as borrower's country, market saturation, loan product, risk levels, etc. We expect the gross returns will vary depending on the development of the region and might range from 5 to 15%. We will aim to balance the risk and the return parts of the equation to have sufficient volume from borrowing side and enough funds to lend.

Author: Debitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Hi, added to the list.

Author: Debitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Assessors will help to set the risk-based pricing for each particular financing case. They will be experts in their fields and will earn coins and their income also depends on the previous track record. It will also be possible to invest without assessment of particular risk assessor.

Author: finvestor
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Thanks for clarifying this. Looking forward for the ICO. Good luck!

Author: lubing7683
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Great idea. In real life, many peoples and medium-sized businesses need more money, but banks have a higher threshold, I think it can help them

Author: Debitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: You are absolutely right. Big financial institutions like banks normally do not work with small and medium businesses leaving them unserved or underserved. Therefore, the credit gap is so big. And in most of our economies small and medium businesses are most crucial part, the backbone of them. Imagine how could we improve our economies by assuring better small and medium business financing. Do you have an idea?

Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem

Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: lubing7683, We know how busy small business owners are and thus, we aim to make the smoothest financing application possible, yet with sufficient information for risk assessment. Thanks for suggestion, which confirms our experience that word-of-mouth is the most effective sales channel. Of course, we will have to build the first relationships to establish recommendation network.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Hi guys!  Debitum Network team is in Gibraltar until Wednesday for the d10e conference (http://d10e.biz/gibraltar-2017/#agenda) to network with investors and take part in ICO pitch competition.  Tadas Langaitis, Innovation and Digital Economy committee at the Parliament of Lithuania, Advisor at Debitum Network will be speaking about ICO regulation in EU country famous for decentralized resistance movements on Monday, 30 October [12:15].  Martins Liberts, CEO & Co-Founder at Debitum Network will be pitching Debitum Network on Tuesday 31st October [ICO Pitch #3, 10:20]  We hope to share an online stream!

Author: DonatasDebitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Thanks, safi71, we hope too. We believe that we have a lot of experience in this field. Debitum Network team members are entrepreneurs who have developed several businesses and are very aware of the problems that exist on the market. With one of our business we almost bankrupt because of cashflow problems. The problem we are solving is based on our experience (we had trouble accessing finance) and are therefore extremely important to us

Author: luksbit
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Also waiting for the materials, only a small doubt, will this funding be exclusively for PMEs? Is there a set rate for financing?

Author: DonatasDebitum
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
Body: Hi. Debitum Network solution is solving credit gap of SMEs. Also core team's experience comes from financing SMEs. So the answer would be yes - this funding is for SMEs. Rate of financing depends on many factors (country, market, risk level, etc.). Investors must be willing to invest in certain loans (or batches of loans). As decentralized financing process should cut some overhead cost, we predict that rates should lower compared to other financing possibilities

Title: [ANN] [ICO] DEBITUM NETWORK - Borderless SME business funding ecosystem
